page.title: 13Social Concerns
page.content: The main concern of this area is the motorway around and across the river Severn. Before the present{Severn {Bridge}there was a ferry from {Aust}to {Beachley.}When the plans for the Severn Bridge and the motorway were released people were generally against it because of the noise and it might go through their land.Once it was built people got used to it and they began to see the good points of it. The Severn Bridge, through lack of finance has now deteriorated. There are plans for a barrage futher down stream, infact several different plans. The other concern is the quarry being extended over peoples' land and more rubbish tips in the area. Groups of people have fought unsucessfully against these plans.
